Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to police activity. 

Shuttle buses are available from the area of Skokie to Howard.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: 

#97 Skokie

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark, #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark, #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark, #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via, Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
